metadata.title: CVE-2024-5594 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
control channel: refuse control channel messages with nonprintablecharacters in them. Security scope: a malicious openvpn peer can sendgarbage to openvpn log, or cause high CPU load

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-5594` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

openvpn - 2.6.11-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openvpn package in oracular was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.6.11-1ubuntu1').
